remarks: The Inversion Axiom of the infinite-valued sentential logic (L-infinity) of Lukasiewicz.  Using ~ dfor2 , we can see that this essentially expresses "disjunction commutes."  Theorem *2.69 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 108.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Aug-2004.)
statement: looinv $p |- ( ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ps ) -> ( ( ps -> ph ) -> ph ) ) $.
